1.text: Have you been feeling worried or nervous in the past week?

2.text: Would you say that you're usually calm and relaxed?

3.text: What's been making you feel nervous (worried, not calm, not relaxed)?

4.text: Just how nervous (worried, etc.) have you been feeling?

5.text: Have you been shaking at times, or has your heart been racing?

6.text: Do you get into a state of panic?

7.text: Has your sleep, eating, or participation in activities been affected?

8.text: Have things been going well for you?

9.text: Has anything been bothering you lately?

10.text: Can you tell me something about your thoughts on life and its purpose?

11.text: Do you follow a particular philosophy (any special rules, teachings, or religious doctrine)?

12.text: Some people tell me they believe in the Devil; what do you think?

13.text: Can you tell me more about this?

14.text: Can you read other people's minds?

18.text: Is there any reason that someone would want to read your mind?

20.text: How do you spend your time these days?

21.text: Do you prefer to be alone?

22.text: Do you join in activities with others?

23.text: Why not? ... Are you afraid of people, or do you dislike them?

32.text: Do you feel that you can trust most people?

34.text: Are there some people in particular who you don't trust?

35.text: Can you tell me who they are?

36.text: Why don't you trust people (or name specific person)?

37.text: Do you have a good reason not to trust ...?

38.text: Is there something that .... did to you?

39.text: Perhaps something that ... might do to you now?

41.text: Do you get along well with others?

43.text: Do you have a quick temper?

48.text: Do you sometimes lose control of yourself?

49.text: What happens when you lose control of yourself?

52.text: Are there perhaps some people who don't like you?

54.text: Do others talk about you behind your back?

55.text: What do they say about you?

57.text: Does anyone ever spy on you or plot against you?

58.text: Do you sometimes feel in danger?

59.text: Would you say that your life is in danger?

60.text: Is someone thinking of harming you or even perhaps thinking of killing you?

61.text: Have you gone to the police for help?

62.text: Do you sometimes take matters into your own hands or take action against those who might harm you?

64.text: Do you once in a while have strange or unusual experiences?

65.text: Sometimes people tell me that they can hear noises or voices inside their head that others can't hear. What about you?

66.text: Do you sometimes receive personal communications from the radio or TV?

69.text: Are these as clear and loud as my voice?

70.text: How often do you hear these voices, noises, messages, etc.?

71.text: Does this happen at a particular time of day or all the time?

72.text: Can you recognize whose voices these are?

74.text: Are the voices good or bad?

76.text: Do the voices interrupt your thinking or your activities?

77.text: Do they sometimes give you orders or instructions?

79.text: Do you usually obey these orders (instructions)?

80.text: What do you make of these voices (or noises); where do they really come from?

81.text: Why do you have these experiences?

83.text: Do ordinary things sometimes look strange or distorted to you?

84.text: Do you sometimes have “visions” or see things that others can't see?

86.text: Do these visions seem very real or life-like?

87.text: How often do you have these experiences?

88.text: Do you sometimes smell things that are unusual or that others don't smell?

90.text: Do you get any strange or unusual sensations from your body?

92.text: How have you been feeling in terms of your health?

93.text: Do you consider yourself to be in top health?

95.text: Do you have any medical illness or disease?

96.text: Has any part of your body been troubling you?

97.text: How is your head? Your heart? Stomach? The rest of your body?

99.text: Has your head or body changed in shape or size?

102.text: How has your mood been in the past week: mostly good, mostly bad?

103.text: Have there been times in the past week when you were feeling sad or unhappy?

104.text: Is there something in particular that is making you sad?

105.text: How often do you feel sad?

106.text: Just how sad have you been feeling?

108.text: Has your mood in any way affected your sleep?

110.text: Do you participate less in activities on account of your mood?

111.text: Have you had any thoughts of harming yourself?

112.text: Any thoughts about ending your life?

114.text: If you were to compare yourself to the average person, how would you come out: a little better, maybe a little worse, or about the same?

116.text: Just how do you feel about yourself?

118.text: Are you special in some ways?

121.text: Do you have talents or abilities that most people don't have?

123.text: Do you have any special powers?

125.text: Where do these powers come from?

126.text: Do you have extrasensory perception (ESP), or can you read other people's minds?

129.text: Can you be considered to be very bright?

131.text: Would you describe yourself as famous?

132.text: Would some people recognize you from TV, radio, or the newspaper?

133.text: Can you tell me about it?

136.text: Did God assign you some special role or purpose?

137.text: Can you be one of God's messengers or angels?

138.text: What special powers do you have as God's messenger (angel)?

139.text: Do you perhaps consider yourself to be God?

140.text: Do you have some special mission in life?

142.text: Who assigned you to that mission?

143.text: Did you ever do something wrong — something you feel bad or guilty about?

144.text: Just how much does that bother you now?

145.text: Do you feel that you deserve punishment for that?

146.text: What kind of punishment would you deserve?

147.text: Have you at times thought of punishing yourself?

148.text: Have you ever acted on those thoughts of punishing yourself?

149.text: Can you tell me today's date (i.e., the day, month, and year)?

150.text: Can you tell me what day of the week it is?

151.text: What is the name of the place that you are in now?

153.text: What is the address of where you're now staying?

154.text: Can you tell me your home address?

155.text: If someone had to reach you by phone, what number would that person call?

156.text: If someone had to reach you at home, what number would that person call?

157.text: What is the name of the doctor who is treating you?

158.text: Can you tell me who else is on the staff and what they do?

159.text: Do you know who is currently the president (prime minister, etc.)?

161.text: Who is the mayor (town supervisor, etc.) of this city (town, etc.)?

162.text: How long have you been in the hospital (clinic, etc.)?

163.text: Why did you come to the hospital (clinic, etc.)?

164.text: Did you need to be in a hospital (clinic, etc.)?

165.text: Did you have a problem that needed treatment?

166.text: Would you say that you had a psychiatric or mental problem?

167.text: Why?....would you say that you had a psychiatric or mental problem?

168.text: Can you tell me about it and what it consisted of?

169.text: In your own opinion, do you need to be taking medicine?

170.text: Why then are you taking medicines?

171.text: Why?... Does the medicine help you in any way?

172.text: Do you at this time have any psychiatric or mental problems?

173.text: For what reason are you at the hospital (clinic, etc.)?

175.text: Just how serious are these problems?

176.text: Are you ready yet for discharge from the hospital?

177.text: Do you think youll be taking medicine for your problems after discharge?
